de.hebis.it.hds.tools.ids

Class XPN

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hebis.it.hds.tools.ids.XPN

  • public class XPN
extends java.lang.Object
    Static tools to convert, test and compare the ids of the Pica library systems.
    - IPN = internal production number (one to eight digits)
    - PPN = pica production number (the IPN plus one character as check digit)
    TODO extend for new ids with 10(+1) digits
    Version:
    2017-03-22 uh revised
    Author:
    2014 Uwe
